physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a military personnel
 together with numerous prisoners of war. These prisoners of war are lined up in three rows and some of them are not wearing shirts. To the extreme left of the photograph
 a soldier with a rifle slung on his right arm faces the prisoners of war. There is a roofed building at the background of the photograph
 towards the left.

metadata.title_text: Japanese prisoners of war guarded by an Indian sepoy Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
metadata.physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a military personnel, together with numerous prisoners of war. These prisoners of war are lined up in three rows and some of them are not wearing shirts. To the extreme left of the photograph, a soldier with a rifle slung on his right arm faces the prisoners of war. There is a roofed building at the background of the photograph, towards the left.
metadata.subject_terms_1: world wars military personnel prisoners of war
metadata.subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography World War, 1939 - 1945 Japan. Rikugun Prisoner of war Great Britain Army, British Indian Army
